*

Watching Moptop

Jun 7, 2011

Montano watched the screen as Moptop slowly entered it from the left side, hanging delicately in the sky with his arm attached to several balloons. Montano then moved on to Moptop’s photo albums. There were two to choose from depending on the camera-bot one chose. Montano clicked on Ichibot to find an album titled “When Good Towels Go Bad.” Meanwhile, Moptop watched his own screen as Montano drifted in slowly…
